products.name: iPhone 12 Pro
products.details: The iPhone 12's special features include a powerful A14 Bionic chip for top-notch performance and a Super Retina XDR display with True Tone technology for stunning visuals.

products.name: Pixel 5
products.details: Google's flagship smartphone featuring a powerful camera and seamless integration with Google services.

products.name: Airpods Pro
products.details: Apple's high-end tablet with a stunning Liquid Retina display, powerful A-series chip, and support for the Apple Pencil and Magic Keyboard, making it a versatile productivity and creativity tool.

products.name: iPad Pro
products.details: Apple's high-end tablet with a stunning Liquid Retina display and powerful A-series chip.

products.name: Galaxy S21 Ultra
products.details: Samsung's top-of-the-line smartphone boasting an impressive quad-camera setup, S Pen support, and a dynamic AMOLED display for unrivaled performance and creativity.

products.name: Galaxy S21
products.details: Samsung's flagship phone with a sleek design, powerful Exynos/Snapdragon processor, and 5G capabilities, delivering a fast and smooth Android experience.

products.name: M1 Macbook Air
products.desc: Apple Macbook air with apple silicon
products.details: : Apple's thin and lightweight laptop powered by the revolutionary M1 chip, offering outstanding battery life, blazing-fast performance, and a fanless design for silent operation.
